headings.content: HOW CAN I CONTACT THE TEAM FOR HELP?

items.description: If you need any help from our Team contact us via Email.

headings.content: What time will the tournament start in my country?

items.description: Tournaments are Timezoned to your Browser. So when the Time display on you 2pm is start on 2pm.

headings.content: Can I play more then one Tournament per Day?

items.description: Yes you can play more then one Tournament per Day on our Website but its not allowed to play 2Tournaments at the same time because the delay to other Tournaments.
You can see all current games what we offer on the Games Site.

headings.content: How can I claim my prize?

items.description: When you won a Tournament, your prize will automatically be in your Wallet, the next day following your victory.

headings.content: Where should I fill in my score, at the end of a match?

items.description: Once the match is over, you can fill in your score directly on the Website on the Match site. For a sure win, take a picture of your victory with the opponent's name and upload it to the website directly at the match page.

headings.content: Is it possible to pause the OneUpGaming tournament?

items.description: desktop publishing software like including versions.
